physDesc.additional: Script: 'bru tsha. No folio number on the first folio; numbering starting with 34 on the second folio (text continuing from the first folio) Two folios are numbered 39 (so dgu ; so dgu 'og ma). Two folios are numbered 168 (brgya re brgyad ; brgya{d} re brgyad 'og). Numbering in letters on the recto of the folios. 200 is represented by + with a second horizontal stroke, visible from 205 to 209. Last digit written with a numeral on fols. 111–114, 121–124, 131–133 and 141. Orthography: - Bindu for m - Palatalization of m - Abbreviations (e.g., for sems can, thams cad, rdo rje, ye shes, etc.) - Alternative prefix letter 'a for m (e.g., 'gos for mgos, sa 'tshams for sa mtshams) - Supplementary 'a rjes 'jug (e.g., mthu') - Character ba frequently written as pa Numerous interlinear notes (some of which corrections) and marginal glosses. The words from the base text were probably written in color. Only the vowels appear on the image published in the [ZZVAXS4X].

bod kha 1 gis kha cig gnas rabs kyi gzhung rjes su bskyang ba'i ched tsam yin no zer ba dang |
kha cig ka ma la shi la ni khyod kyi bstan bcos 'di brtsaM par bya ba ma yin ste | dgos pa myed pa'i phyir bya
rog gi so brtags pa'i bstan bcos bzhin no zhes | bstan chos rtsoM pa °° dgos pa yod pas khyab pa las khyab byed dgos pa med pas des rtsoM pa la don med ces bstan chos rtsoM pa'i khyab byed myi dmyigs pa ltar 'chos pa'i rtags la brten nas bstan bcos rtsom pa'i skabs 'gog pa'i ngag gam log rtogs phyir zlog pa'i ched du yin zer pa yang yod do ||

dbu' ma pa kha cig klu sgrub kyi rjes su 'brangs pa de'i gzhung legs par mi shes pa na re | 'di ji skad bya ba yin khyod kyi °°°°°nyid du shes pa med pa'i rgyu mtshan de ni myi 'grub ste | gzhi zhes bya ba ni rten 'brel yin la de'i rang bzhin ni stong pa yin pas | nyan thos dang rang rgyal
gyis kyang de shes la des na rten 'brel shes pas stong pa shes pa'i phyir | dus gsuM mnyam par shes pas de'i thabs su 'dra'o zer ro ||

chos can la sogs pa'i mtshan mar 'dzin pa'i sbyor ba de ni de bstan pas 'phangs nas ston pa yin no || spong zho lo tsha ba na re yang de ltar yod pa yin ste de skad |

lo tsa ba dang khyung po grags se na re de byang chub seMs dpa'i yin pas rgyun du zhugs pa la sogs par gzhag pa'i chos ni myed mod kyi | de la byang seMsReading "seMs" unclear nyan thos rgyun du zhugs pa la sogs par btags pa yin no || de'i rgyu mtshan
ni 'jug pa dang ldog pa °°°°°° dang °°°° bzhin med par rtogs la byang seMs gyis thams cad rtogs pa'i rtogs pa dang spangs pa nyon mongs pa'i dang nyes bya'i sgrib pa'i phyogs 1 spangs pa dang byang seMs kyis tham cad daM ci rigs pa spangs pas na chung zad 'dra ba yod pas so || dgos pa ni kha cig gi bsaM pa la dge 'dun bya ba ni skyes bu zung bzhi dang gang zag ya brgyad yin pas byang chub seMs dpa' la de'i don med do snyaM pa'i dogs pa bzlog pa'i don du yin no || rngos la gnod pa ni mdo shes phyin dang phyir mi ldog pa 'khor lo'i mdo' gnyis las byang chub seMs dpa'i dge 'dun du gsungs pa'i phyir ro zer ro ||

rngos su 'gyur bar rigs so ||

de'i sa mtshams ni rin chen grags pas las dang po pa tshogs laM la gnas pa yan chad kyi la 'dzin no || de ni mdo las byang chub
seMs dpa' phyir myi ldog pa zhes gsungs pa dang 'gal lo || shan ti bas nges 'byed yan lag nas bzungs te zhes pa'i rjes su 'brangs nas drod yan chad la 'dzin no ||

ma hAs de sangs rgyas kyi
sa la byas pa nas de'i sten yon tan ni 'bre na re ma legs te | de ltar na byang chub seMs dpa' bcu' gnyis su 'gyur ba'i phyir dang | sangs rgyas kyi sa de bsgrub pa ma yin pa'i phyir ro skad do ||

bdun gyi yul can gyi sgrub pa 'dir ba pa 'dir bstan pas kyang sgrub pa thams cad bzhi po 'dir 'dus pa'i rtogs pa skyed pa'i don du yin te | bzhi po 'di ni tshogs kyi laM nas sa bcu pa'i bar gyi bsgrub pa bsdus pa yin la gnas skabs der ma gtogs pa'i bsgrub pa gtan myed pa'i phyir ro ||

gnyis pa so sor bstan pa la bzhi las |
dang po go cha'i bsgrub pa ston pa las 'tshamsmtshams
sbyor gyi sgo nas sa mtshams ston pa las | chos kyi bshes gnyend khyung pos ltar na go rims ji lta ba bzhin bya ba yin pas | go cha ni sbyor laM | 'jug pa ni mthong laM | bsgom °°°°°dang khyad par °°° gnyis su ° | dang po ni °°° tshogs ni sgom laM sa bdun pa man chod | nges par 'byung ba ni sa brgyad pa'i khyad par gyi laM mo zhes bshad do 'o na brgyad stong 'grel °° dang mi mthun no zhe na nas | brgyad stong 'grel par ni gzhan thugs med gyi lugs brjod pa yin la °° lung gi ni rang lugs yin pas mi 'gal lo zhes so ||
de dag ni rigs par °°° ji ltar rang bzhin la don med pa'i phyir dang | brgyad stong °°°°las bshad pa'i °°° rmongs pa'i phyir dang | des na bshad pa °° slob dpon gyi °°° ste | de lta ba yin na seMs kyi 'jug °°° laM las °°° dang | ° gyi tshigs kyang dang °°°° tshogs 'gal °° phyir ro | zhes °°°° de ni ma yin te brgyad stong 'grel pa las rgyud pa dang rngos kyi sbyor ba zhes de gnyis su bshad pas 'di pha gi dang dgrig par nus pa'i phyir ro ||
'buM pa'i rang rgyud du bshad pa ltar na thams cad gzung ba myed pa'i chos nyid kho na la sbyar ro ||

'o na byang chub seMs dpa' nyan rang gi nges 'byed mthong laM sgom laM la sogs la sogs unclear pa'i rtogs pa nyid shes par byed zer na | de dag gnas skabs gang du g°°s par byed na 'brom ltar na nyan thos dang rang rgyal gyi nges 'byed dang mthong laM bsgom laM la sogs pa thams cad byang
chub seMs dpa'i nges 'byed du shes par byed pa yin te | nyan thos kyi mthong ba'i laM gyi rtogs pas × kyang byang chub seMs dpa'i rtse mo'i rtogs pa las ma sleb× pas de man chad du shes par byed la | rang rgyal gyi mthong laM gyi rtogs pas kyang byang chub seMs dpa'i bzod pa'i rtogs pa las ma sleb pas de man chad du shes par byed pa yin no || des na kun las
btus pa las gang zag gi brda' bsal ba dang | chos kyi brda' bsal ba dang | thams cad du gnyis ka'i brda' bsal ba'i mthong laM gsuM gsungs pa yang | rim pa bzhin du nyan thos dang rang rgyal dang byang chub seMs dpa' gsuM gyi mthong laM gsuM gsungs pa yin pas gang zag dang chos kyi brda' bsal ba gnyis ni byang chub seMs dpa'i nges 'byed du 'dus pa yin skad do ||
'o na nyan thos dang rang rgyal gyi mthong laM rtog pa myed pa yin la byang chub seMs dpa'i nges 'byed ni rtog pa dang bcas pa yin pas rtog pa med pa de der rtog bcas 'du bar mi rigs so byas pa la | nyan thos rang rgyal gyi mthong laM rang yang rtog pa las ma 'das pa yin zer skad do ||

'bre na re mi rigs te | nyan thos dang rang rgyal gyi rtog pa dang bcas pa yin na | 'o na nyan rang de dag gis gang
zag gi bdag myed pa dang gzung ba myed pa 'i °° nyid mngon gsuM du °°°°°°°°°° | mngon suM du ma mthong ba yin la | des na mthong bas spang bar bya ba'i sgrib pa las ma grol bar 'gyur ro ||

ma hA ltar na nyan thos dang rang rgyal gyi rtogs pa thams cad ni byang chub seMs dpa'i sa brgyad pa la skyed par byed pa yin pas de dag gi laM shes pa dang gzhi shes kyang sa de la gzhag par bya ba yin te °°°°°°Long note at the bottom of the folio, faded. sa brgyad pa la rnaM par myi rtog pa'i ye shes la dbang thob
pa'i gzhi shes pa gzhan lugs su kyi go ba ni °°°°'o || ° gzhi rkyang °° laM dang rnaM pa la rtag gaM ci rtogbyas pa la de 2 sla ba °°°°°°°° gzugs rnyanbrnyan gyi tshul du bskyed pa'i phyir ro gsung ste |

'bre na re de ni mi rigs te gzugs brnyan gyi don gang yin | de rang rgyud pa'i rgyud la skye ba bzhin du dmyigs bcanpa can "bcan" could also be read as "bcas"°° du skye ba yin naM | 'on te mi dmyigs pa'i rnam pas de dag gi laM yon tan yar ldan du rgyud la skyed pa la bya | dang po ni ma yin te dmyigs
pa ni sgro 'dogs pa yin pas | byang chub seMs dpa' de spangs pa yang de skyed par ji ltar 'gyur | gnyis pa yang ma yin te | mi dmyigs pa'i rnaM pa can de byang chub seMs dpa'i sa brgyad °°° sa × sa °°° la sogs pa 'og mar yang rgyud la skyed par mi nus pa ci yod te bsdus pa'o|| de ni gzugs rnyanbrnyan gyi don gzhi rkyang shes pa la zer ba yin skad do ||

°°°°°°sa brgyad par shes par byed pa de yang mthong °°° 'bre na re 'di{°} 'di ni thad ka thad kar
gzhag par bya ste nyan thos dang rang rgyal gyi nges 'byed ni byang chub sems dpa'i nges 'byed du shes la | de dag gi mthong ba'i laM gyi rtog pa dang spangs pa ni byang chub sems dpa'i sa rab tu dga' bar 'dus la | bsgom laM gyi rtogs pa dang spangs pa ni sa gnyis pa nas bdun pa'i bar du 'dus la | mi slob pa'i rtogs pa dang spangs pa pa ni sa brgyad par 'dus pas de dag mi
dmyigs par yang gnas skabs de nyid du shes par byed do ||

'brom na re shes pa dang byed pa gnyis
ni 'bras bu'i rtags yin la | khyad par ni rang bzhin gyi rtags yin zhing | ngo bo yang mtshan nyid rtags su bzhag pa'i rang bzhin yin no ||
